golden_diagnosis: 阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria,阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria,Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria 2,阵发性睡眠性血红蛋白尿症/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria; PNH/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria/Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria
predict_diagnosis:
1. Aplastic anemia - a rare disease characterized by the failure of the bone marrow to produce enough new blood cells.
2. Fanconi anemia - a group of rare disorders that affect the bone marrow and lead to a decrease in the number of red blood cells, white blood cells, and platelets.
3. Paroxysmal nocturnal hemoglobinuria (PNH) - a rare blood disorder that affects the red and white blood cells and platelets.
4. Thalassemia - a group of inherited blood disorders that result in the body's inability to produce enough healthy hemoglobin.
5. Hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis (HLH) - a rare disorder that causes the immune system to attack the body's own cells and tissues.
6. Severe combined immunodeficiency (SCID) - a group of disorders that lead to a breakdown of the immune system.
7. Fibrous dysplasia - a rare disease that leads to abnormal growth and development of bone, causing pain, deformity, and fractures.
8. Amyloidosis - a group of disorders that result from the buildup of abnormal proteins in the body.
9. Lysosomal storage diseases - a group of inherited disorders that affect the body's ability to break down certain substances.
10. Congenital dyserythropoietic anemia - a group of rare disorders that affect the bone marrow's ability to produce red blood cells.
